alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Hawkins; Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:08PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sullivan, northeastern Hawkins, northeastern Hancock, southeastern Lee and western Scott Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 308 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Rogersville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Rogersville, Gate City, Surgoinsville, Weber City, Church Hill, Mount Carmel, Duffield, Clinchport and Jasper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee...and southwestern Virginia.
